title: Run Registration
description: Registers a run of the ingestion system

id.description: The unique identifier for this run

type.description: The type of run being performed

tenant.description: The tenant for which the run is being performed

backfillId.description: The ID of the backfill associated to this run, if it is a backfill run

runRangeStartTime.description: The nullable start date/time associated to the range for the run

runRangeEndTime.description: The nullable end date/time associated to the range for the run

initialLoadElements.description: The set of 1 or more elements that are processed as the initial loads for the run
